scripts.setup: docker-compose up -d && npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate
scripts.install:all: cd services/api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd services/api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.build: cd services/api && npm run build && cd ../web && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd services/api && npm run lint && cd ../web && npm run lint
